name: Emplacement Demo
description:
WARNING:

Please note that the HTML version of Emplacement is only to make the game more accessible to play. The HTML version might be laggy & contain bugs because it hasn't been fully tested or optimized for this platform. I highly recommend downloading Emplacement if possible.

Controls

  • Camera Movement - W,A,S,D or Arrow Keys
  • Placement - Left-Click

Emplacement is an innovative and strategic turn-based game that combines elements of tile-laying and combat. The game is played on an isometric board, with each player taking turns to place tiles in an attempt to gain the upper hand over their opponent. The game is similar to chess in that players must think ahead and anticipate their opponent's moves in order to succeed.

Please consider wishlisting emplacement on steam if you like the look or enjoyed playing.

Release date: June 2023
